description:
The first major target must be the daughter marrying into the family in hopes of taking his inheritance. She must be dealt with.
Source: hanime.tv

titles.title: A Huge-breasted Elite Younger Female Cousin: Reina - Disgraced Bride
Kyonyuu Elite Itoko Reina: Kegasareta Hanayome
巨乳エリート従兄妹・玲奈 ~穢された花嫁~
